name: TEKNIN GLOBAL SOLUTIONS
tag_list: materials, data, coding, cataloguing, cleansing, autocad, pdms, pds, hierachy, asset
overview:
Teknin Global Solutions (TGS) is a company formed to serve the needs of process and manufaturing industries in the area of materials, maintenance, document and drawing management.

Teknin team has decades of experience in Asset management for Oil & Gas, Petrochemicals, Refineries, Mining, CPG/FMCG, etc.

Key Services:

1) Materials Data Standardization/Enrichment 2) Data Cleansing, coding and cataloguing to global standards 3) Equipment Hierarchy 4) Functional location 5) Bill of Materials 6) Maintenance procedures/ work instructions 7) Document indexing & linking 8) AutoCAD, PDS, PDMS solutions
